This one doesn't play for me. I get only still pictures when playing it using Power DVD. Suggestions anyone? Downloaded it a couple of weeks ago with the same result. This is the only one that I can't see. King Kong for example, runs just fine.

I have downloaded the whole movie and tried VCL Media Player and all three players in FinalCode Player. I get picture in all players (a bit dark compared to other movies) but there in NO sound. All my other downloaded movies have good audio.
Anybody know how to get the audio working on Kingdom of Heaven?

ABSOLUTELY works....you just have to do a little digging:

First, you need HDTVPump:

http://www.dvbportal.de/projects/hdtvpump/

And then (At least for any HD-DVD releases by HDTV_CHINA i have) you need Matroska Splitter

http://haali.cs.msu.ru/mkv/

You will also need to have a MPEG2 decoder previously installed. NVIDIA's works. If you can play a DVD - chances are you have a valid decoder.

Install those and report back!

THANKYOU "hurrafor" for info!
Now I get HDTV CHINA movies working in FinalCode Player. 

Many THANKYOUs to HDTV CHINA for his great work. KEEP IT UP!
